clients.name: Damus
clients.description: The social network you control. Your very own Twitter for your friends or business

clients.name: Nostr rocks
clients.description: A clone of twitter built on nostr

clients.name: Iris
clients.description: Iris is like the social networking apps we're used to, but better.

clients.name: Nostr console
clients.description: This is an experimental or pre-alpha software made to show or know what a Nostr network client would look like

clients.name: Coracle Social
clients.description: While Nostr is useful for many things, Coracle focuses on providing a high-quality social media experience

clients.name: Nostroid
clients.description: This client is meant to feel like Twitter. If you are used to Twitter, you should feel at home with Nostroid

clients.name: Nvote
clients.description: Nvote is a decentralized, vote-driven community similar to services like Reddit and HackerNews

clients.name: Nostros
clients.description: Welcome to the Nostros project, a NOSTR android client.

clients.name: Blockcore Notes
clients.description: New ways to connect with humanity. Share your thoughts and interact with others in a fully transparent and open manner that is not restricted by any boundries

clients.name: Opencord
clients.description: A censor-free, discord-like web app based on the Nostr Protocol

clients.description: A native Android client for Nostr

clients.description: The blue bird experience for Nostr.

clients.description: Nostr client
